00035 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 // CMultiViewsView2::CMultiViewsView2()
00037 // C++ default constructor can NOT contain any code, that might leave. 
00038 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 //
00040 CAknExNoteContainer::CAknExNoteContainer( CAknExNoteView* aView )
00041 : iLabel( NULL ), iView( aView )
00042   
00043     {
00044     // No implementation required
00045     }

00048 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // CAknExNoteContainer::ConstructL()
00050 // Symbian 2nd phase constructor can leave.
00051 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 //
00053 void CAknExNoteContainer::ConstructL( const TRect& aRect )
00054     {
00055     // Creates window.
00056     CreateWindowL();
00057 
00058     // Creates label object.
00059     CreateLabelL();
00060 
00061      // Sets rectangle of frame.
00062     SetRect( aRect );
00063 
00064     // Activates the window. (Ready to draw)
00065     ActivateL();
00066     }

00070 // Destructor.
00071 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 //
00073 CAknExNoteContainer::~CAknExNoteContainer()
00074     {
00075     delete iLabel;
00076     delete iIdle;
00077     }

00079 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 // CAknExNoteContainer::SetTextToLabelL()
00081 // Sets text to Label
00082 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 //
00084 void CAknExNoteContainer::SetTextToLabelL( TInt aResourceId )
00085     {
00086     //Allocate TBuf with constant length.
00087     TBuf<KAknExNoteMessageBufLength> messageString( NULL );
00088 
00089     // Reads a resource into a descriptor.
00090     iCoeEnv->ReadResource( messageString, aResourceId );
00091     
00092     // Set label's text with descriptor
00093     iLabel->SetTextL( messageString );
00094     }

00096 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 // CAknExNoteContainer::ShowGeneralNoteL()
00098 // Show General Note
00099 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 //
00101 void CAknExNoteContainer::ShowGeneralNoteL( TInt aResourceId, 
00102                                             const CAknNoteDialog::
00103                                             TTimeout aTimeout, 
00104                                             const CAknNoteDialog::TTone aTone )
00105     
00106     {
00107     // Create CAknNoteDialog instance
00108     CAknNoteDialog* dlg = new ( ELeave ) CAknNoteDialog( aTone, aTimeout );
00109     
00110     // Show the Dialog
00111     dlg->ExecuteLD( aResourceId );
00112     }

00114 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 // CAknExNoteContainer::ShowGeneralNoteL()
00116 // Show General Note
00117 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 //
00119 void CAknExNoteContainer::ShowGeneralNoteL( TInt aResourceId, 
00120     TInt /* aControlId */, const CAknNoteDialog::TTimeout aTimeout,
00121     const CAknNoteDialog::TTone aTone,TBool aPlural )
00122     {
00123 
00124     // Create CAknNoteDialog instance
00125     CAknNoteDialog* dlg = new ( ELeave ) CAknNoteDialog( aTone, aTimeout );
00126 
00127     dlg->PrepareLC( aResourceId );
00128     dlg->SetTextPluralityL( aPlural );
00129     
00130     // Show the Dialog
00131     dlg->RunLD();
00132     }

00134 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 // CAknExNoteContainer::ShowDynamicNumberNoteL()
00136 // Show Dynamic Number Note
00137 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 //
00139 void CAknExNoteContainer::ShowDynamicNumberNoteL()
00140     {
00141 
00142     // Create CAknNoteDialog instance
00143     CAknNoteDialog* dlg = new ( ELeave ) CAknNoteDialog( 
00144                                          CAknNoteDialog::EConfirmationTone, 
00145                                          CAknNoteDialog::ELongTimeout );
00146 
00147     dlg->PrepareLC( R_AKNEXNOTE_DYNAMIC_TEXT );
00148     TTime theTime( KAknExNoteInitializeTime );
00149     theTime.UniversalTime();
00150     TInt64 randSeed( theTime.Int64() );
00151     TInt number( Math::Rand( randSeed ) % KAknExNoteRandomNumberRange );
00152     dlg->SetTextPluralityL( EFalse );
00153     dlg->SetTextNumberL( number );
00154     
00155     // Show the Dialog
00156     dlg->RunLD();
00157     }

00168     CAknWaitDialog* waitDialog =  new ( ELeave ) CAknWaitDialog( NULL, ETrue );

00170     // Show the Dialog
00171     waitDialog->ExecuteLD( aResourceId ); 
00172     }

00174 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 // CAknExNoteContainer::ShowProgressNoteUnderSingleProcessL()
00176 // Show ProgressNote Under Single Process.
00177 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 //
00179 void CAknExNoteContainer::ShowProgressNoteUnderSingleProcessL( 
00180                                                           TInt aResourceId, 
00181                                                           TInt /* aControlId */)
00182     { 
00183     // Delete possible previous CAknProgressDialog.
00184     delete iProgressDialog;
00185 
00186     // Create new CAknProgressDialog.
00187     iProgressDialog = new ( ELeave ) CAknProgressDialog( reinterpret_cast
00188                                                          <CEikDialog**> 
00189                                                          ( &iProgressDialog ) );
00190     
00191     iProgressDialog->SetCallback( this );
00192     iProgressDialog->PrepareLC( aResourceId );
00193     iProgressInfo = iProgressDialog->GetProgressInfoL();
00194     iProgressInfo->SetFinalValue( KAknExNoteProgressbarFinalValue );
00195     iProgressDialog->RunLD();
00196 
00197     delete iIdle;
00198     iIdle = CIdle::NewL( CActive::EPriorityStandard );
00199     TCallBack callback( CallbackIncrementProgressNoteL, this );
00200     iIdle->Start( callback );
00201     }
00202 
00203 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00204 // CAknExNoteContainer::ShowShowNoteL()
00205 // Show Note.
00206 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00207 //
00208 void CAknExNoteContainer::ShowShowNoteL( TAknGlobalNoteType aType, 
00209                                          TInt aResourceId )
00210     {
00211     //Allocate TBuf with constant length.
00212     TBuf<KAknExNoteTextBufLength> text( NULL );
00213 
00214     // Reads a resource into a descriptor.
00215     CEikonEnv::Static()->ReadResource( text, aResourceId );
00216 
00217     TPtrC noteText( text );
00218 
00219     // Create new CAknGlobalNote instance.
00220     CAknGlobalNote* globalNote = CAknGlobalNote::NewL();
00221 
00222     // Push CAknGlobalNote's pointer to CleanupStack
00223     CleanupStack::PushL( globalNote );
00224 
00225     iPermanentNoteId = globalNote->ShowNoteL( aType, noteText );
00226 
00227     // Pop and Destroy CAknGlobalNote's pointer from CleanupStack
00228     CleanupStack::PopAndDestroy();
00229     }
00230 
00231 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00232 // CAknExNoteContainer::CallbackIncrementProgressNoteL()
00233 // Just call UpdateProgressNote() function.
00234 // If return 1(ETrue), CIdle calls this again.
00235 // If retrun 0(EFalse), CIdle does not call this.
00236 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00237 //
00238 TInt CAknExNoteContainer::CallbackIncrementProgressNoteL( TAny* aThis )
00239     {
00240     return static_cast<CAknExNoteContainer*>( aThis )->UpdateProgressNote();
00241     }
00242 
00243 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00244 // CAknExNoteContainer::UpdateProgressNote()
00245 // Updates ProgressNote
00246 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00247 //
00248 TInt CAknExNoteContainer::UpdateProgressNote()
00249     {
00250     TTime intervalTime;
00251     intervalTime.HomeTime();
00252     intervalTime += TTimeIntervalMicroSeconds( 50000 );
00253     TTime currentTime;
00254     currentTime.HomeTime();
00255 
00256     while ( intervalTime > currentTime )
00257         {
00258         currentTime.HomeTime();
00259         }
00260 
00261     iProgressInfo->IncrementAndDraw( 1 );
00262     if ( KAknExNoteProgressbarFinalValue <= iProgressInfo->CurrentValue() )
00263         {
00264         iProgressDialog->ProcessFinishedL();
00265         delete iProgressDialog;
00266         iProgressDialog = NULL;
00267         return 0;
00268         }
00269     return 1;
00270     }
00271 
00272 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00273 // CAknExNoteContainer::DialogDismissedL()
00274 // Called when/if the dialog has been dismissed.
00275 // iIdle must be canceled when cancel button is pressed.
00276 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00277 //
00278 void CAknExNoteContainer::DialogDismissedL( TInt aButtonId )
00279     {
00280     // Check when pressing cancel button.
00281     if ( aButtonId == -1 )
00282         { 
00283         delete iIdle;
00284         iIdle = NULL;
00285         }
00286     }
00287 
00288 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00289 // CAknExNoteContainer::CreateLabelL()
00290 // Creates label object.
00291 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00292 //
00293 void CAknExNoteContainer::CreateLabelL()
00294     {
00295     if ( iLabel )
00296         {
00297         delete iLabel;
00298         iLabel = NULL;
00299         }
00300 
00301     // Create new CEikLabel instance
00302     iLabel = new ( ELeave ) CEikLabel;
00303     iLabel->SetContainerWindowL( *this );
00304     iLabel->SetAlignment( EHCenterVCenter );
00305     
00306     // Set lablel's font
00307     iLabel->SetFont( LatinBold19() );
00308 
00309     // Set the Label's text from resource.
00310     SetTextToLabelL( R_AKNEXNOTE_TEXT_LABEL_TITLE );
00311     }
00312 
00313 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00314 // CAknExNoteContainer::OfferKeyEventL()
00315 // Handles the key events.
00316 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00317 //
00318 TKeyResponse CAknExNoteContainer::OfferKeyEventL( const TKeyEvent& aKeyEvent,
00319                                                   TEventCode aType )
00320     {
00321     // Is not key event?
00322     if ( aType != EEventKey )
00323         {
00324         return EKeyWasNotConsumed;
00325         }
00326 
00327     switch ( aKeyEvent.iCode )
00328         {
00329         // Space key.
00330         case EKeySpace: 
00331 
00332             // Requires to display next outline screen.
00333             iView->DisplayNextOutlineL();
00334             DrawNow();
00335             break;
00336 
00337         // Is list box created?
00338         default:
00339             return EKeyWasNotConsumed;
00340         }
00341     return EKeyWasConsumed;
00342     }
00343 
00344 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00345 // CAknExNoteContainer::SizeChanged()
00346 // Called by framework when the view size is changed.
00347 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00348 //
00349 void CAknExNoteContainer::SizeChanged()
00350     {
00351     iLabel->SetRect( Rect() );
00352     }

00354 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00355 // CAknExNoteContainer::CountComponentControls()
00356 // Returns number of component.
00357 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00358 //
00359 TInt CAknExNoteContainer::CountComponentControls() const
00360     {
00361     // return nbr of controls inside this container
00362     TInt count( KAknExNoteComponentCount );
00363     return count;
00364     }
00365 
00366 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00367 // CAknExNoteContainer::ComponentControl()
00368 // Returns pointer to particular component.
00369 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00370 //
00371 CCoeControl* CAknExNoteContainer::ComponentControl( TInt aIndex ) const
00372     {
00373     switch ( aIndex )
00374         {
00375         // Label object.
00376         case EAknExNoteComponentLabel: 
00377             return iLabel;
00378         // Exception : returns NULL value.
00379         default:
00380             return NULL;
00381         }
00382     }
00383 
00384 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00385 // CAknExNoteContainer::Draw() const
00386 // Clears the window's rectangle.
00387 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00388 //
00389 void CAknExNoteContainer::Draw( const TRect& aRect ) const
00390     {
00391     CWindowGc& gc = SystemGc();
00392     gc.SetPenStyle( CGraphicsContext::ENullPen );
00393     gc.SetBrushColor( KAknExNoteGray );
00394     gc.SetBrushStyle( CGraphicsContext::ESolidBrush );
00395     gc.DrawRect( aRect );
00396     }
